{{also|sekunde|sekundē|sekundė}} ==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|Secunde}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|[zeˈkʊndə]}} * {{audio|de|De-Sekunde.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Sekunde.ogg|audio (Austria)}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Sekunden}} # A unit of time; a [[second]]. # A unit of angular measurement; a [[second]]. # {{lb|de|music}} An [[interval]] of 1 (''kleine Sekunde'') or 2 (''große Sekunde'') [[halftone]]s. ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|n}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de|Schaltsekunde |Sekundenbruchteil |sekundengenau |sekundenlang |sekündlich |Sekundenschlaf |sekundenschnell |Sekundenschnelle }} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Time]] [[Category:de:Units of measure]]
